markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silkspinner's Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1245)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 11</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This oddly fuzzy [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1) (Hardness 10, HP 60, BT 30) resembles the abdomen of a spider. Its defensive side is covered in fine hairs, and two small spinnerets protrude from the bottom of its rim. The spinnerets serve as _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42)_.

<document level="2" id="action-1004" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Silkspinner's Shield
